Clip.Title: BLOOD RIVER CROSSING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A baby zebra and his mother join hundreds of thousands of wildebeest and other herbivores on a bloody mission through the predator-packed expanses of the Serengeti-Mara ecosystem. Their mission is survival, but when the mother and son become separated in the crocodile-infested Mara River, each must fight its own battle alone.

Clip.Title: DEATH BEACH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A high number of fatal shark attacks along a South African beach leads a marine biologist on a mission to explain these predators' overly aggressive behavior.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet performs revolutionary surgical techniques to save the lives of his four legged patients. See Oscar the cat get a bionic foot transplant and Mayo the arthritic dog, an "X-Men" inspired surgical procedure.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: About the size of Texas, the island country of Papua New Guinea sits just to the North of Australia. At Papua's far eastern tip lies Milne Bay - holding one of the planet's highest concentrations of marine species.

Clip.Title: BLOOD RIVER CROSSING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A baby zebra and his mother join hundreds of thousands of wildebeest and other herbivores on a bloody mission through the predator-packed expanses of the Serengeti-Mara ecosystem. Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Fishermen of Oman struggle to keep up with relief efforts after a massive Cyclone decimates their towns...A Cyclone that seemed to be strengthened by Global Warming.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Canada's easternmost point to Europe's westernmost point, this aerial survey explores the Atlantic coastline, from the wonders of St. John's Newfoundland and the Avalon peninsula - to the unique islands of St. Pierre and Miquelon.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: SPACE VOYAGES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Mercury to Gemini, from Apollo to Curiosity, NASA's giant leaps in engineering and science over the last 60 years have been nothing short of astronomical. Blast off on a celestial voyage as we explore the first half-century of the Space Age. Celebrate the triumphs, lament the tragedies, and learn how modern engineers are using the past as a blueprint, refining yesterday's technologies in hopes of sending humans off to Mars and beyond.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Southwest from the Fraser Canyon - BC's lower Mainland is a mix of remote mountain ranges, spectacular cityscapes and diverse Marine life - as the Fraser River meets the open waters of the Pacific.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the outskirts of Vancouver, to world famous Whistler-Blackcombe - the Sea to Sky corridor reveals one of the West Coast's most iconic landscapes.

Clip.Title: BLACK WINGS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the barnstorming era through World War II and into the jet age, the worlds of aviation and race relations intersect in these fascinating stories of courage and innovation.

Clip.Title: SEIZING JUSTICE: THE GREENSBORO 4
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Actress and Activist Anna Deavere Smith celebrates the 50th Anniversary of the Desegregation of Greensboro Woolworth Lunch Counter.

Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: THE CRADOCK MURDERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In June of 1985 in Cape Province, four anti-apartheid activists were ambushed and murdered. They became known as "the Cradock Four." See how their contributions paved helped pave the way for the of the racist Apartheid regime.

Clip.Title: BLACK WINGS
